label: water
caption: A young boy, dressed in casual summer clothes, stands at the edge of a large fountain in a bustling city square. With a carefree grin on his face, he takes a running leap and soars through the air, landing with a splash in the center of the water feature, creating a miniature wave that sends droplets flying upwards. The sunlight glints off the rippling water as children's laughter echoes through the surrounding buildings.
